abstract: A map of efforts to amplify doubt on risks from greenhouse gases.
snippet: A map of efforts to amplify doubt on risks from greenhouse gases.
lead_paragraph: Oct. 3, 9:00 p.m. | Updated A chart of "key components of the climate change denial machine" has been produced by Riley E. Dunlap, regents professor of sociology at Oklahoma State University, and Aaron M. McCright, an associate professor of sociology at Michigan State University. The diagram below (reproduced here with permission) is from a chapter the two researchers wrote on organized opposition to efforts to curb greenhouse gases for the new Oxford Handbook of Climate Change and Society.

headline.main: A Map of Organized Climate Change Denial
